DOC.brief_summary: THRIVE observational study collect information patient UCDs . THRIVE follow enrol participant 10 year . As observational study , enrol patient require make additional office visit take medicine outside normal care .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study That Will Collect Information Patients With Urea Cycle Disorders ( UCDs )
DOC.detailed_description: UCDs disproportionately affect child female : depend severity defect , UCD manifest shortly birth late life . This study track long-term outcome UCD patient effect ammonia-scavenging agent neuropsychological function UCD patient . This non-interventional , multi-center registry conduct patient UCDs . Investigators prescribe treatment base usual clinical practice , restriction use commercially available medication . As observational study , study change patient/ healthcare provider relationship , influence healthcare provider 's drug prescription therapeutic management patient . Patients UCDs recruit invited attend Baseline visit . After eligible patient enrol , retrospective baseline data collect . Patients follow 10 year , time assess healthcare provider . Patients healthcare provider ask report episode hyperammonemic crisis , available ammonia value , information .
DOC.criteria: Confirmed suspect diagnosis UCD Signed inform consent/Health Insurance Portability Accountability Act ( HIPAA ) Authorization medical record release Any reason , Investigator 's opinion , make patient unsuitable participate study .
